status: Pending with the Committee on SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS since 2019-02-07
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09049
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REORGANIZING THE COMELEC OFFICES
ABSTRACT : Proposes to address the notable disparity between the Commission's employee's salary against that of other government agencies, despite possessing similar qualifications and are in equivalent positions. Provides for the Commission's field offices such as: a. Regional Election Office; b. Provincial Election Office; c. The National Capital Region; and City/Municipal Office.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND JR. F.
DATE FILED : 2019-02-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS ON 2019-02-07
